Svetlana Khan

Full Stack Web Developer

About

Myself

My name is Svetlana. I'm a Full Stack Web Developer based in San Francisco. As a self-motivated and naturally inquisitive person, I am constantly looking for new problems to solve, and better ways to solve previous ones. Because of my passion for learning, I always push myself to become a better coder!

Web Application: Full Stack Development

Grocery Bag

Your personal Grocery Bag makes it easy for you to keep in mind what to buy in the daily busy life

...

Live Demo

To see the app in action, go to Grocery Bag Demo

Features

  • Authentication:

    • User signup with username, password

    • User login with username and password

  • User is able to create, view, and delete grocery list

Built with

Front-End

Google fonts, Materialize

Back-End

Express.js, MongoDB, Mongoose, Ejs, passport, passport-local, express-session, body-parser, method-override

Web Application: Full Stack Development

Movie Search

Movie Search is MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, NodeJS) stack web application

...

The web-app allows user search for movie through The Movie DB API.

Live Demo

To see the app in action, go to Movie Search Demo

Features

  • Allow user to search movie from Movie DB API

  • Allow user to click on movie and read description

  • In case user likes particular movie, allow user to add to his/her list

Built with

Front-End

React, Semantic UI

Back-End

Express.js, MongoDB, Mongoose, The Movie Database API

To see the app in action, go to Drop Table Photo Service Demo

Features
